version_description: Minor Bug Fixes
Minor Bug Fixes
Minor Bug Fixes

Fixed issue where users were not able to create new handles
Fixed issue where some users were not able to post their equipment using a city that was the same as a state (i.e. Delaware, OH)

Truckstop Mobile provides an all new improved user interface and user experience with features that Truckstop.com users have relied upon.

Now you can accept load tracking requests with one click! Search for loads and post your truck with an improved user interface.

Now you can accept load tracking requests with one click! Search for loads and post your truck with an improved user interface.

·  Performance optimization and bug fixes
·  You can now edit previously submitted check calls
·  We simplified how you refresh a load search
·  Added the ability to view documents while offline

- Your sort preferences will now be saved when searching for loads.
- Removed the ‘accept load’ disclaimer page.
- Improved Load Tracking with battery optimization

We release updates regularly and we’re always looking for ways to make things better. Please reach out to mobilefeedback@truckstop.com with question/comments/feedback.

We release updates regularly and we’re always looking for ways to make things better. Please reach out to mobilefeedback@truckstop.com with question/comments/feedback.

- Your sort preferences will now be saved when searching for loads.
- Removed the ‘accept load’ disclaimer page.
- Improved Load Tracking with battery optimization

We release updates regularly and we’re always looking for ways to make things better. Please reach out to mobilefeedback@truckstop.com with question/comments/feedback.

* Dashboard that includes quick links to post your truck, view your favorite searches and a ‘get me home’ button that will automatically search for a load based on your home location. It will also show any unread alerts, pending load offers and your active loads.
* You can now manually type in a radius when searching for a load or posting your truck.
* The app icon will now include a badge showing unread alerts.
* You can now sort your load searches by Rate Per Mile.

We release updates regularly and we’re always looking for ways to make things better. Please reach out to 800-203-2540 or mobilefeedback@truckstop.com with question/comments/feedback

• Search results show the total number of loads available
• A new “recent search” feature that makes it easier to re-run a previous search
• Improved search results screen with additional load details
• You can now easily distinguish between the loads you have and haven’t viewed
